summary: Create an engagement task that uses a self-defined custom message instead of predefined message templates from TikTok Shop
description:
Create an engagement task that uses a self-defined custom message instead of predefined message templates from TikTok Shop. The task acts as a container for grouping messages with similar content and rules, allowing sellers to track and compare task performance across different types of content.​ Note that each task has a mandatory end time, and once expired, it cannot be used to send additional messages.​ Version
202502
